title: bagguss
author: bagguss
content: marketminers.store is trustley supplier? I want to order from them.

comments.author: moandre
comments.body: Quote from: bagguss on September 15, 2022, 06:41:31 PMmarketminers.store is trustley supplier? I want to order from them.YES. I BOUGHT FROM THEM. IS A SUPPLIER FROM TAIWAN.THEY HAVE FAST DELIVERY.

comments.body: Quote from: bagguss on September 15, 2022, 06:41:31 PMmarketminers.store is trustley supplier? I want to order from them.FOR SURE. I'M DEALING WITH THEM MORE THAN FEW MONTHS. RECEIVED THE PRODUCTS.

comments.author: taitBTC
comments.body: I'm dealing with them too, they are very good with fast delivery for sure, but something they delivery delay with 1-2-3 days.

comments.author: bagguss
comments.body: Quote from: taitBTC on September 15, 2022, 06:48:47 PMI'm dealing with them too, they are very good with fast delivery for sure, but something they delivery delay with 1-2-3 days.When was the last time you bought?

comments.author: taitBTC
comments.body: Quote from: bagguss on September 15, 2022, 06:49:28 PMQuote from: taitBTC on September 15, 2022, 06:48:47 PMI'm dealing with them too, they are very good with fast delivery for sure, but something they delivery delay with 1-2-3 days.When was the last time you bought?My last order was placed on 02 sept. and i received my L7 on 13 sept.

comments.author: bagguss
comments.body: I'm getting into the mining business. I was wondering if https://marketminers.store/ It's worth dealing with? From what I can gather online they look like trustworthy online shop where I can purchase ASICs. Considering these things aren't cheap, I decided to ask around just to be double sure about this. I'm sure everyone understands that my stupid question is important to me.

comments.author: stompix
comments.body: Nice try OP, and nice try on the three newbies that signed-up all on the 2nd of September and ended up shilling this garbage.Dealing with them for a few months? When the website is 35 days old ? Lol.And those addresses, are you the guys that launched the other scam, bitminers.asia  ?https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5309218.msg56102602#msg56102602

comments.body: Quote from: stompix on September 15, 2022, 06:59:53 PMNice try OP, and nice try on the three newbies that signed-up all on the 2nd of September and ended up shilling this garbage.Dealing with them for a few months? When the website is 35 days old ? Lol.Lol.OP is trying to farm his shill accounts and at the same shilling his scam service which he pretends not to know about  The service is 100% scam and I think he and his shill accounts deserve a tag.bagguss(OP) - Date Registered:    September 02, 2022, 01:44:47 PMShill farm that replies in all his threads:moandre - Date Registered:    September 02, 2022, 02:36:36 PMtaitBTC - Date Registered:    September 02, 2022, 10:27:23 PMauditracy - Date Registered:    September 02, 2022, 05:07:12 PM

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: Quote from: bagguss on September 15, 2022, 06:58:03 PM I'm getting into the mining business. I was wondering if marketminers.store It's worth dealing with? From what I can gather online they look like trustworthy online shop where I can purchase ASICs. Considering these things aren't cheap, I decided to ask around just to be double sure about this. I'm sure everyone understands that my stupid question is important to me.How can you say this website is legit?Look at this from whoisCode:Domain:marketminers.storeRegistrar:NamecheapRegistered On:2022-08-11Expires On:2023-08-11Updated On:2022-09-09A new domain is most likely a scam website no one should deal with a new website without a review from trusted users here on the forum. I hope that you are not one of the alts of the OP if you are looking for a legit store selling ASIC units then check this Current List of Competitive Hardware

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: Quote from: BitMaxz on September 15, 2022, 10:58:41 PMI hope that you are not one of the alts of the OP if you are looking for a legit store selling ASIC units then check this Current List of Competitive HardwareOP knows what he's doing, he's trying to advertise his scam site while pretending to be naive while his alts come in with fake positive buzz.Not so long as OP made a post asking about an S19. You innocently made a good suggestion to him and some of OP alts also made suggestions showing that OP actually knows the official and legit site to buy hardware from
